Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista N-terminal Pro-Brain Natriuretic Peptide (PBNP) Flex Reagent Cartridge (K6423A)
Dimension Vista N-terminal Pro-Brain Natriuretic Peptide (PBNP) Calibrator (KC676A)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dimension Vista PBNP Flex Reagent Cartridge and Calibrator for quantitative NT-proBNP measurement using chemiluminescent immunoassay.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of NT-proBNP in human serum and plasma on the Dimension Vista System to aid diagnosis and assessment of congestive heart failure and risk stratification in acute coronary syndrome and heart failure; calibrator intended for assay calibration.
